card.name: Accorder Paladin
card.text: Battle cry

card.name: Ardent Recruit
card.text: Metalcraft - Ardent Recruit gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Banishment Decree
card.text: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Black Sun's Zenith
card.text: Put X -1/-1 counters on each creature. Shuffle Black Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

card.name: Bladed Sentinel
card.text: {W}: Bladed Sentinel gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Blightsteel Colossus
card.text: Trample, infect, indestructible If Blightsteel Colossus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Blightsteel Colossus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

card.name: Blisterstick Shaman
card.text: When Blisterstick Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Blue Sun's Zenith
card.text: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

card.name: Bonehoard
Brass Squire
card.text: {T}: Attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control.

card.name: Burn the Impure
card.text: Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature has infect, Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Caustic Hound
card.text: When Caustic Hound dies, each player loses 4 life.

card.name: Choking Fumes
card.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on each attacking creature.

card.name: Concussive Bolt
card.text: Concussive Bolt deals 4 damage to target player. Metalcraft - If you control three or more artifacts, creatures that player controls can't block this turn.

card.name: Consecrated Sphinx
card.text: Flying Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may draw two cards.

card.name: Contested War Zone
card.text: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, that creature's controller gains control of Contested War Zone. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Copper Carapace
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and can't block. Equip {3}

card.name: Core Prowler
card.text: Infect When Core Prowler dies, proliferate.

card.name: Corrupted Conscience
card.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature has infect.

card.name: Creeping Corrosion
card.text: Destroy all artifacts.

card.name: Crush
card.text: Destroy target noncreature artifact.

card.name: Cryptoplasm
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Cryptoplasm become a copy of another target creature. If you do, Cryptoplasm gains this ability.

card.name: Darksteel Plate
Decimator Web
card.text: {4}, {T}: Target opponent loses 2 life, gets a poison counter, then puts the top six cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Distant Memories
card.text: Search your library for a card, exile it, then shuffle your library. Any opponent may have you put that card into your hand. If no player does, you draw three cards.

card.name: Divine Offering
card.text: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Dross Ripper
card.text: {2}{B}: Dross Ripper gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Fangren Marauder
card.text: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may gain 5 life.

card.name: Flayer Husk
Flesh-Eater Imp
card.text: Flying Infect Sacrifice a creature: Flesh-Eater Imp gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Frantic Salvage
card.text: Put any number of target artifact cards from your graveyard on top of your library. Draw a card.

card.name: Fuel for the Cause
card.text: Counter target spell, then proliferate.

card.name: Galvanoth
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Glissa, the Traitor
card.text: First strike, deathtouch Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Gnathosaur
card.text: Sacrifice an artifact: Gnathosaur gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Go for the Throat
card.text: Destroy target nonartifact creature.

card.name: Goblin Wardriver
card.text: Battle cry

card.name: Gore Vassal
card.text: Sacrifice Gore Vassal: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Then if that creature's toughness is 1 or greater, regenerate it.

card.name: Green Sun's Zenith
card.text: Search your library for a green creature card with converted mana cost X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Shuffle Green Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

card.name: Gruesome Encore
card.text: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. If that creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

card.name: Gust-Skimmer
card.text: {U}: Gust-Skimmer gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Hellkite Igniter
card.text: Flying, haste {1}{R}: Hellkite Igniter gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control.

card.name: Hero of Bladehold
card.text: Battle cry Whenever Hero of Bladehold attacks, put two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.

card.name: Hero of Oxid Ridge
card.text: Haste Battle cry Whenever Hero of Oxid Ridge attacks, creatures with power 1 or less can't block this turn.

card.name: Horrifying Revelation
card.text: Target player discards a card, then puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Ichor Wellspring
card.text: When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Inkmoth Nexus
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}: Inkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying and infect until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Into the Core
card.text: Exile two target artifacts.

card.name: Kemba's Legion
card.text: Vigilance Kemba's Legion can block an additional creature for each Equipment attached to Kemba's Legion.

card.name: Knowledge Pool
card.text: Imprint - When Knowledge Pool enters the battlefield, each player exiles the top three cards of his or her library. Whenever a player casts a spell from his or her hand, that player exiles it. If the player does, he or she may cast another nonland card exiled with Knowledge Pool without paying that card's mana cost.

card.name: Kuldotha Flamefiend
card.text: When Kuldotha Flamefiend enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, Kuldotha Flamefiend deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Kuldotha Ringleader
card.text: Battle cry Kuldotha Ringleader attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Lead the Stampede
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Leonin Relic-Warder
card.text: When Leonin Relic-Warder enters the battlefield, you may exile target artifact or enchantment. When Leonin Relic-Warder leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Loxodon Partisan
card.text: Battle cry

card.name: Magnetic Mine
card.text: Whenever another artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Magnetic Mine deals 2 damage to that artifact's controller.

card.name: Massacre Wurm
card.text: When Massacre Wurm enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn. Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Master's Call
card.text: Put two 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Melira's Keepers
card.text: Melira's Keepers can't have counters placed on it.

card.name: Metallic Mastery
card.text: Gain control of target artifact until end of turn. Untap that artifact. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Mirran Crusader
card.text: Double strike, protection from black and from green

card.name: Mirran Mettle
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Metalcraft - That creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead if you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Mirran Spy
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may untap target creature.

card.name: Mirrorworks
card.text: Whenever another nontoken artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, put a token that's a copy of that artifact onto the battlefield.

card.name: Mitotic Manipulation
card.text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put one of those cards onto the battlefield if it has the same name as a permanent. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Morbid Plunder
card.text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Mortarpod
Myr Sire
card.text: When Myr Sire dies, put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Myr Turbine
card.text: {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield. {T}, Tap five untapped Myr you control: Search your library for a Myr creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Myr Welder
card.text: Imprint - {T}: Exile target artifact card from a graveyard. Myr Welder has all activated abilities of all cards exiled with it.

card.name: Nested Ghoul
card.text: Whenever a source deals damage to Nested Ghoul, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Neurok Commando
card.text: Shroud Whenever Neurok Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.name: Oculus
card.text: When Oculus dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Peace Strider
card.text: When Peace Strider enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Phyresis
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has infect.

card.name: Phyrexian Crusader
card.text: First strike, protection from red and from white Infect

card.name: Phyrexian Hydra
card.text: Infect If damage would be dealt to Phyrexian Hydra, prevent that damage. Put a -1/-1 counter on Phyrexian Hydra for each 1 damage prevented this way.

card.name: Phyrexian Juggernaut
card.text: Infect Phyrexian Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Phyrexian Rager
card.text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Phyrexian Rebirth
card.text: Destroy all creatures, then put an X/X colorless Horror artifact creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the number of creatures destroyed this way.

card.name: Phyrexian Revoker
card.text: As Phyrexian Revoker enters the battlefield, name a nonland card. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.

card.name: Phyrexian Vatmother
card.text: Infect At the beginning of your upkeep, you get a poison counter.

card.name: Pierce Strider
card.text: When Pierce Strider enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life.

card.name: Piston Sledge
card.text: When Piston Sledge enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control. Equipped creature gets +3/+1. Equip - Sacrifice an artifact.

card.name: Pistus Strike
card.text: Destroy target creature with flying. Its controller gets a poison counter.

card.name: Plague Myr
card.text: Infect {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Plaguemaw Beast
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Proliferate.

card.name: Praetor's Counsel
card.text: Return all cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Praetor's Counsel. You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.

card.name: Psychosis Crawler
card.text: Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Quicksilver Geyser
card.text: Return up to two target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.

card.name: Rally the Forces
card.text: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Razorfield Rhino
card.text: Metalcraft - Razorfield Rhino gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Red Sun's Zenith
card.text: Red Sun's Zenith deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead. Shuffle Red Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

card.name: Rot Wolf
card.text: Infect Whenever a creature dealt damage by Rot Wolf this turn dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Rusted Slasher
card.text: Sacrifice an artifact: Regenerate Rusted Slasher.

card.name: Sangromancer
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may gain 3 life. Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may gain 3 life.

card.name: Septic Rats
card.text: Infect Whenever Septic Rats attacks, if defending player is poisoned, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Serum Raker
card.text: Flying When Serum Raker dies, each player discards a card.

card.name: Shimmer Myr
card.text: Flash You may cast artifact cards as though they had flash.

card.name: Shriekhorn
card.text: Shriekhorn enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Shriekhorn: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Signal Pest
card.text: Battle cry Signal Pest can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

card.name: Silverskin Armor
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and is an artifact in addition to its other types. Equip {2}

card.name: Skinwing
Slagstorm
card.text: Choose one - Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each creature; or Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each player.

card.name: Sphere of the Suns
card.text: Sphere of the Suns enters the battlefield tapped and with three charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Sphere of the Suns: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Spin Engine
card.text: {R}: Target creature can't block Spin Engine this turn.

card.name: Spine of Ish Sah
card.text: When Spine of Ish Sah enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent. When Spine of Ish Sah is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Spine of Ish Sah to its owner's hand.

card.name: Spiraling Duelist
card.text: Metalcraft - Spiraling Duelist has double strike as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Spire Serpent
card.text: Defender Metalcraft - As long as you control three or more artifacts, Spire Serpent gets +2/+2 and can attack as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Spread the Sickness
card.text: Destroy target creature, then proliferate.

card.name: Steel Sabotage
card.text: Choose one - Counter target artifact spell; or return target artifact to its owner's hand.

card.name: Strandwalker
Sword of Feast and Famine
Tangle Hulk
card.text: {2}{G}: Regenerate Tangle Hulk.

card.name: Tezzeret, Agent of Bolas
card.text: +1: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. -1: Target artifact becomes a 5/5 artifact creature. -4: Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is twice the number of artifacts you control.

card.name: Thopter Assembly
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control no Thopters other than Thopter Assembly, return Thopter Assembly to its owner's hand and put five 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Thrun, the Last Troll
card.text: Thrun, the Last Troll can't be countered. Hexproof {1}{G}: Regenerate Thrun.

card.name: Titan Forge
card.text: {3}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Titan Forge. {T}, Remove three charge counters from Titan Forge: Put a 9/9 colorless Golem artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Training Drone
card.text: Training Drone can't attack or block unless it's equipped.

card.name: Treasure Mage
card.text: When Treasure Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Turn the Tide
card.text: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Unnatural Predation
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Vedalken Anatomist
card.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. You may tap or untap that creature.

card.name: Vedalken Infuser
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on target artifact.

card.name: Victory's Herald
card.text: Flying Whenever Victory's Herald attacks, attacking creatures gain flying and lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Viridian Claw
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike. Equip {1}

card.name: Viridian Corrupter
card.text: Infect When Viridian Corrupter enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Viridian Emissary
card.text: When Viridian Emissary dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Virulent Wound
card.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. When that creature dies this turn, its controller gets a poison counter.

card.name: Vivisection
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Vivisection, sacrifice a creature. Draw three cards.

card.name: White Sun's Zenith
card.text: Put X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens onto the battlefield. Shuffle White Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
